TopicTitle: Problem with Rpm mod - Not working

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I'm having trouble with the Rpm Mod, it is not working. I've searched all over the internet, sometimes people do not install it in the proper way, so i checked and i did intall the mod in right way, everything is fine (location in GameData, .dll locations) yet, when i launch the game,  it seems that it is not working, the cockpit it's still the same as in the vanilla game. I need help guys, i really want to play with this mod.
The install path should be ksp/GameData/JSI    and you need to have ModuleManager.*.*.* installed and it should work  by the way what cockpit ?

8 hours ago, MeCripp said:

The install path should be ksp/GameData/JSI    and you need to have ModuleManager.*.*.* installed and it should work  by the way what cockpit ?

 

Oh I don't have Module Manager, thanks i will try installing it. By cockpit I meant the interiors of all capsules

Edited April 29, 2017 by Dman979
Fixed your quote for you. :)
